sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"带，拿，取"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: bring, carry, take, fetch, get, convey, transport
means: bring ： 指从某处把人或物带到或拿到说话者所在的地点，强调方向，不着重方式。
carry ： 指把物品从一个地方带到另一个地方，不涉及方向，只强调方式。
take ： 指从说话人或说话人心目中所在处把某人或某物带离开，带到离说话者有一定距离的地方，与bring的方向正相反，侧重方向，不着重方式。
fetch ： 指一往一返，相当于go and bring，去取了东西或带人再返回到出发处。
get ： 口语用词，与fetch基本同义，语气随便。
convey ： 指通过中间人传递信息，或以某种方式把人或物送到目的地。
transport ： 指使用车辆或机械设备把人或货物从一处运载到另一处。

entry.def: If you bring someone or something with you when you come to a place, they come with you or you have them with you.

example.ex: Remember to bring an apron or an old shirt to protect your clothes...
example.tran: 记得带一个围裙或者一件旧衬衫来，免得弄脏你的衣服。

example.ex: Come to my party and bring a girl with you...
example.tran: 带一个女伴来参加我的聚会吧。

entry.def: If you bring something somewhere, you move it there.

example.ex: Reaching into her pocket, she brought out a cigarette...
example.tran: 她伸手从兜里掏出来一支烟。

example.ex: Her mother brought her hands up to her face.
example.tran: 她母亲拉起她的双手放到自己脸上。

entry.def: If you bring something that someone wants or needs, you get it for them or carry it to them.

example.ex: He went and poured a brandy for Dena and brought it to her...
example.tran: 他走过去为德娜倒了一杯白兰地，端到她跟前。

example.ex: The stewardess kindly brought me a blanket.
example.tran: 女乘务员体贴地给我拿来了毯子。

entry.def: To bring something or someone to a place or position means to cause them to come to the place or move into that position.

example.ex: I told you about what brought me here...
example.tran: 我告诉过你是什么把我带到这儿的。

example.ex: The shock of her husband's arrival brought her to her feet...
example.tran: 丈夫的到来惊得她站了起来。

entry.def: If you bring something new to a place or group of people, you introduce it to that place or cause those people to hear or know about it.

example.ex: ...a brave reporter who had risked death to bring the story to the world.
example.tran: 一位冒着生命危险向世人报道此事的勇敢记者

example.ex: ...the drive to bring art to the public.
example.tran: 将艺术介绍给公众的事业

entry.def: To bring someone or something into a particular state or condition means to cause them to be in that state or condition.

example.ex: He brought the car to a stop in front of the square...
example.tran: 他在广场前把车停了下来。

example.ex: His work as a historian brought him into conflict with the political establishment...
example.tran: 他是一位历史学家，工作的缘故使他处在了和政界的当权者对立的位置上。

entry.def: If something brings a particular feeling, situation, or quality, it makes people experience it or have it.

example.ex: He called on the United States to play a more effective role in bringing peace to the region...
example.tran: 他呼吁美国在实现该地区的和平方面发挥更加富有成效的作用。

example.ex: Kinkel said the attacks had brought disgrace on Germany...
example.tran: 金克尔声称这次袭击使德国蒙羞。

entry.def: If a period of time brings a particular thing, it happens during that time.

example.ex: For Sandro, the new year brought disaster...
example.tran: 对桑德罗来说，新的一年带来的是灾难。

example.ex: We don't know what the future will bring.
example.tran: 我们不知道将来会发生什么。

entry.def: If you bring a legal action against someone or bring them to trial, you officially accuse them of doing something illegal.
entry.tran: （对某人）提起（诉讼）；将（某人）送上（法庭）

example.ex: He campaigned relentlessly to bring charges of corruption against former members of the government...
example.tran: 为了将前政府成员以贪污腐败的罪名送上法庭，他持续不懈地奔走游说。

example.ex: The ship's  captain and crew may be brought to trial and even sent to prison.
example.tran: 这艘船的船长和船员可能会被告上法庭，甚至有可能坐牢。

entry.def: If a television or radio programme is brought to you by an organization, they make it, broadcast it, or pay for it to be made or broadcast.
entry.tran: 提供，制作，播出（电视或广播节目）

example.ex: You're listening to Science in Action, brought to you by the BBC World Service...
example.tran: 您正在收听的是《科学在行动》，由BBC全球广播频道制作播出。

example.ex: We'll  be bringing you all the details of the day's  events.
example.tran: 我们将为您带来今天各项赛事的所有详情。

entry.def: When you are talking, you can say that something brings you to a particular point in order to indicate that you have now reached that point and are going to talk about a new subject.
entry.tran: 把（某人）带到（或引到）（某话题）

example.ex: Which brings me to a delicate matter I should like to raise...
example.tran: 这就把我带到了一个我想提及的敏感问题上。

example.ex: And that brings us to the end of this special report from Germany.
example.tran: 这篇发自德国的特别报道也到此结束。

entry.def: If you cannot bring yourself to do something, you cannot do it because you find it too upsetting, embarrassing, or disgusting.
entry.tran: 强迫（自己）做（令人伤心、窘迫或讨厌的事）

example.ex: It is all very tragic and I am afraid I just cannot bring myself to talk about it at the moment.
example.tran: 这是件很不幸的事，恐怕现在我还无法开口谈论此事。

entry.def: If you bring up a particular subject, you introduce it into a discussion or conversation.

example.ex: He brought up a subject rarely raised during the course of this campaign...
example.tran: 他提出了一个在这次运动中很少被提及的话题。

example.ex: Why are you bringing it up now?
example.tran: 你为什么现在要把这个问题提出来？

entry.def: If someone brings up food or wind, food or air is forced up from their stomach through their mouth.

example.ex: It's hard for the baby to bring up wind.
example.tran: 婴儿不容易打出嗝来。

means.word_mean: 1. take something or somebody with oneself somewhere;

sentences.sentence: "Bring me the box from the other room"
"Take these letters to the boss"
"This brings me to the main point"

means.word_mean: 2. cause to come into a particular state or condition;

sentences.sentence: "Long hard years of on the job training had brought them to their competence"
"bring water to the boiling point"

means.word_mean: 3. cause to happen or to occur as a consequence;

sentences.sentence: "I cannot work a miracle"
"wreak havoc"
"bring comments"
"play a joke"
"The rain brought relief to the drought-stricken area"

means.word_mean: 4. go or come after and bring or take back;

sentences.sentence: "Get me those books over there, please"
"Could you bring the wine?"
"The dog fetched the hat"
"this may land you in jail"
"Can I bring my cousin to the dinner?"
"Her presence lends a certain cachet to the company"
"The music added a lot to the play"
"She brings a special atmosphere to our meetings"
"This adds a light note to the program"

means.word_mean: 8. avance or set forth in court;

sentences.sentence: "bring charges", "institute proceedings"

means.word_mean: 9. be sold for a certain price;

sentences.sentence: "The painting brought $10,000"
"The old print fetched a high price at the auction"
"The noise and the screaming brought the curious"
"The confession of one of the accused brought the others to admit to the crime as well"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bringan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch brengen and German bringen

sentences.cn: 下次来时把它带来.
sentences.en: When next you come, bring it.

sentences.cn: 她的成功给她家带来了荣誉.
sentences.en: Her success bring credit to her family.

sentences.cn: 他们为香港带来新的技术和经验,令香港的经济更为充实.
sentences.en: They also bring new skills and experiences to enrich our economy.

sentences.cn: 另外, 把我的早饭带来.
sentences.en: And what's more, bring me my breakfast.

sentences.cn: 此外, 网上仲裁将会给当事人带来更多的经济实惠.
sentences.en: In addition, the arbitration net will bring more economic benefit to party.

sentences.cn: 作为上海首家虚拟办公的场所, 引擎企管给您带来一场办公革命.
sentences.en: As Shanghai's first virtual office premises, business management engine to bring you a revolution in office.

sentences.cn: 更多的伤亡以及混乱的局势可不能给以色列周边带来和平.
sentences.en: More killing and chaos will not bring peace with Israel nearer.

sentences.cn: 单边撤离计划虽然不能带来真正的和平, 但至少能带来平静.
sentences.en: A unilateral withdrawal would not bring formal peace, but it could at least bring calm.

sentences.cn: 经济增长过快也会带来一系列的问题.
sentences.en: Economic overgrowth will bring about a series of problems.

sentences.cn: 燃点蜡烛时,注意下列各点,它会为您带来柔和气氛及无穷乐趣.
sentences.en: Pay attention to the following and your candles will bring you hours of serenity and pleasure.

sentences.cn: 我们需要快乐的火炬传递, 这不是对死者的不敬, 而是为了给所有的中国人带来骄傲.
sentences.en: We need torch relay, not irreverence to dead, but to bring pride to China!

sentences.cn: 认为财富总能带来幸福是一种错误的见解.
sentences.en: It is a fallacy to suppose that riches always bring happiness.

sentences.cn: 给儿童带来刷牙的喜悦,给老弱者、体障者带来方便.
sentences.en: Bring happiness for children and convenience for old and disabled.

sentences.cn: 要是我记着,我就给你带来.
sentences.en: I will bring it to you if I think on.

sentences.cn: 兴趣是锚, 我相信它最终会带来和平,甚至幸福.
sentences.en: Interests are anchors, and I believe they will bring peace and even happiness in the end.

sentences.cn: 考虑到他的想法会给双方带来好处,我们采纳了这个意见.
sentences.en: We accepted his idea in the thought that it would bring benefit to both sides.

sentences.cn: 此外, 本币结算业务也为商业银行带来了良好的经济效益.
sentences.en: In addition, the local currency clearing operations for commercial banks to bring good economic benefits.

sentences.cn: 二进制的稀有的地球氧化物为我们带来多种有趣的特性.
sentences.en: The binary rare earth oxides bring us variety of interesting characteristics.

sentences.cn: 开车的时候小心一些,由于有时候月蚀会带来坏天气,到底安静第一嘛!
sentences.en: Eclipses sometimes bring difficult weather conditions another reason safety first.

sentences.cn: 企业家们承受商业风险和给市场带来新事物.
sentences.en: Entrepreneurs assume business risk or bring a new product to market.

sentences.cn: 冬天的暴风雪带来了冰, 雹和雪.
sentences.en: Winter storms bring ice, sleet and snow.

sentences.cn: 故而, 利用企业文化力进行营销必能给企业带来勃勃生机.
sentences.en: Therefore, we could use power of corporate culture for marketing bring vitality.

sentences.cn: 一座房子的历史和精彩刺激的故事可以帮助吸引来游客.
sentences.en: A home's history and a juicy story can help bring tourists. "

sentences.cn: 即使是一点火星的温度都会把它们成群地引来!
sentences.en: And the tiniest spark of warmth will bring them in Iike moths.

sentences.cn: 别出声, 小姐. 这片水域里有被诅咒的海盗们出没. 你可不想把他们给引来吧.
sentences.en: Gibbs: Quiet, missy. Cursed pirates sail these waters. You don't want to bring them.

sentences.cn: 危机促使她表现出她最好的一面。
sentences.en: A crisis brings out the best in her .

sentences.cn: 这也将促使未来进一步的有益合并.
sentences.en: It could catalyse further mergers that would bring gains of their own.

sentences.cn: 我主动充当调解人,促使双方和解.
sentences.en: I offered to act as mediator and tried to bring about a reconciliation between the two parties.

sentences.cn: 我们必须采取步骤促使事情达到决定阶段.
sentences.en: We must bring things to a crisis.

sentences.cn: 这些丁基自由基促使苯乙烯聚合速度加快.
sentences.en: These butylraidicals bring about a rapid polymerization of styrene.

sentences.cn: 众议长佩洛西说在早些时候,众议院领导人将努力促使该法案通过.
sentences.en: Speaker Pelosi said House leaders will bring the bill for a vote at the earliest date.

sentences.cn: 这种温暖的天气应该促使作物生长.
sentences.en: This warm weather should bring the crops forward.

sentences.cn: 暖和的天气会促使农作物生长.
sentences.en: This warm weather should bring on the crops.

sentences.cn: 他们将设法促使战争得以迅速解决.
sentences.en: They were going to try to help bring about a rapid solution of the war.

sentences.cn: 在斡旋的某一阶段,调解人便运用这份人情来促使双方同意提议中的妥协.
sentences.en: To intervene between two or more disputants in order to bring about an agreement aa compromise.

sentences.cn: 为了安全,政府正促使汽车制造商使汽车达到标准.
sentences.en: The government is making car makers bring their cars up to standard for safety reasons.

sentences.cn: 广岛和长崎的原爆是必需的,促使日本投降.
sentences.en: The bombing of Hiroshima and Nagasaki was necessary to bring about the surrender of Japan.

sentences.cn: 这次全民公决将会促使波多黎各进一步摆脱对美国的依靠。
sentences.en: The referendum will bring Puerto Rico one step closer to cutting the island's umbilical cord to the United States.

sentences.cn: 竞争会带来痛苦、仇恨,或者引起争斗.
sentences.en: Rivalries could bring about pain and hatred or give rise to fighting.

sentences.cn: 趋向于引起或发生的; 导致的.
sentences.en: Conducive: Tending to cause or bring about; contributive.

sentences.cn: 当我们由静电时引起降雨雪我们可以达到稳定的消极离子供应.
sentences.en: When we generate precipitation by static electricity we can bring about a stable negative ion supply.

sentences.cn: 好几个原因起作用,引起了这场战争.
sentences.en: Several causes operated to bring on the war.

sentences.cn: 全球变暖会引起一系列的变化,例如虫害 、 洪水、土壤侵蚀等.
sentences.en: Global warming will bring about changes to insect populations, flooding and soil erosion.

sentences.cn: 老实说, 我并不想让事情引起你的注意.
sentences.en: Frankly, I hadn't planned to bring the matter to your attention.

sentences.cn: 治因咽喉痛引起的感冒最好的办法?
sentences.en: Bring cold best way arousing because of pharynx and larynx pain under control?

sentences.cn: 一个微不足道的事物有时也会引起人们不愿意见到的后果.
sentences.en: A trivial thing may sometimes bring about undesirable consequences.

sentences.cn: 他的笑话总是引起哄堂大笑.
sentences.en: His jokes always bring down the house.

sentences.cn: 运用这种技术将引起水果生产的一场革命.
sentences.en: The application of this technology will bring up a revolution in fruit production.

sentences.cn: 而且我认为那将会引起在那一个个性方面的改变.
sentences.en: And I think that will bring about a change in that character.

sentences.cn: MalcolmGladwell在将这些发现引起大众关注意上所做的工作超过任何人.
sentences.en: Nobody has done more to bring these discoveries to public attention than Malcolm Gladwell.

sentences.cn: 污水能引起许多疾病.
sentences.en: Polluted water might bring forth a host of diseases.

sentences.cn: 往往一言不合马上会勾引起他心头的猜疑和怨恨.
sentences.en: The slightest disagreement tended to bring to the fore his underlying suspicion and resentment.

sentences.cn: 那种软软的叫声不能引起任何人的注意.
sentences.en: One soft scream that would not bring anyone running.

sentences.cn: 微生物是引起化学变化的作用者.
sentences.en: Microorganisms are the agents that bring about the chemical change.

sentences.cn: 我们想引起人们对随机强迫的重要性的重视.
sentences.en: We attempt to bring into attention the importance of stochastic forcings.

sentences.cn: 知识管理的实施引起对知识管理系统构建的广泛探索和研究.
sentences.en: The implement of Knowledge Management ( KM ) bring comprehensive research in the Construction of Knowledge Management System ( KMS ).

sentences.cn: 否则事件发展下去,将对香港经济长远发展引起负面影响.
sentences.en: This will also bring negative effect towards term development of Hong Kong economics.

sentences.cn: 近几年, 我国电力供应紧张现象再次引起了各方面的关注.
sentences.en: Recently, the power supply is tight, which bring the attentions of all levels.

sentences.cn: 好几个原因结合在一起引起了那场战争.
sentences.en: Several causes operated bring on the war.

sentences.cn: 每个士兵的去世引起公众鼓噪,使美国士兵和海军陆战队员回家.
sentences.en: Each soldier's death raises public clamor to bring U.S. soldiers and Marines home.

sentences.cn: 在昏暗的灯光下看书会引起头疼.
sentences.en: Reading in a poor light may bring on a headache.

sentences.cn: 圆轴轴肩处若采用尖角过渡,承载时将引起较大的应力集中.
sentences.en: If transition a circular shaft adopting closed angle will bring biggish stress concentration as bearing load.

sentences.cn: 敌意让人痛苦、互相仇视,易于引起暴力.
sentences.en: Rivaries could bring about pain and hatred or give rise to fighting.

sentences.cn: 计算过程考虑了核热沉积以及热传导、热辐射 、 对流引起的换热过程.
sentences.en: Conduction, Convection and radiation can bring heat influxes.

sentences.cn: 我担心,他们会在斯坦福桥内部引起一些分歧.
sentences.en: I fear they might succeed to bring a division inside Stamford Bridge.

sentences.cn: 慢性铜中毒,会引起呼吸系统疾病 、 眼部疾病 、 皮肤疾病等.
sentences.en: Chronic copper toxicity will bring respiratory disease, disease of ocular conjunctivitis, skin disease and so on.

sentences.cn: 有些新技术也会有很多不利之处,这一点应该引起我们的注意.
sentences.en: Some new technology will also bring about some disadvantages which must be paid attention to.
